artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige II; Publisher: Fujiokaya Keijirō; Carver: Koizumi Kanegorō
description: temple courtyard with lanterns and other sculptures; numerous figures; two grey gateways at left, red gateway at right; buildings in background; very large tree at left; accordion-folded album with black soft cover
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Views of Famous Places in Edo (Edo meishō zue 江戸名勝圖會)
title: Myōken Shrine at Yanagishima
